Hello and thank you for the opportunity to study here.

I am interested in =
learning about the Sanda family of Shinano
province, circa: 1500s to early =
1600s.

I have scoured the Samurai Archives site with great joy.  Are there=

any books or other referrence someone might point me to as well?  I
cannot=
 read Japanese, only english.

thank you very kindly,
-Jason
